about_the_game:
Expand your journey in the "Maze of Realities: Synergy of Worlds" point and click adventure with the thrilling DLC! This expansive addition introduces four all-new locations teeming with fresh mini-games, intricate mysteries, hidden objects, and challenging puzzles. Each location uncovers deeper layers of the story and characters, pushing your investigative prowess to new heights. Meet new characters with their own motives and secrets. Each location introduces plot twists that challenge your perceptions and reveal hidden truths about the Etheria and its inhabitants!

Enjoy revamped gameplay mechanics and additional bonus materials that enhance your overall experience. The DLC offers new achievements and collectible items, providing hours of exciting content and replayability!

🌌 EXPLORE THE TREE GUARDIANS' HEADQUARTERS!
Venture into the heart of the Tree Guardians' domain and explore their comprehensive archive. Unearth hidden information about the inhabitants of other worlds and engage in mini-games to piece together a crucial list of potential threats to Etheria!

🌌 UNRAVEL FLAMMAR AND UTAR'S DISPUTE!
Infiltrate Uthar's former cabin and solve the enigmatic riddle of the astrolabe. Discover the real reasons behind the rift between Flammar and Uthar, and determine if one of them harbors dangerous intentions towards Etheria!

🌌 LEARN MORE ABOUT ANCIENT MAGIC!
Navigate through an old library filled with concealed sections and arcane secrets. Find hidden objects to capture their energy imprint, unravel the secrets of the zoetrope, and unlock critical information about ancient magical practices!

🌌 DISCOVER THE HISTORY OF MAGISTRALIX!
Access a mystical memory well to delve into the past of Magistralix. Solve a series of intricate puzzles and engaging mini-games to unlock and explore its memories, gaining valuable insights that could impact your quest and the fate of Etheria!

With new challenges and deeper lore, this DLC promises an unforgettable extension of your journey through Etheria. Prepare to test your skills and uncover the hidden truths that lie within!
